price: Sε wͻhu (agyidiefoͻ) no a, asεm a wͻka ne sε: “Nokorε sε, saa nkorͻfoͻ yi ayera paa.”
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awhum qālū inna hāulāi laḍāllūna
